info.title: Platformatic DB
info.description: Exposing a SQL database as REST

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new job to the database.

put.description: Update one or more jobs in the database.

get.description: Fetch Job using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more jobs from the Database.

get.description: Fetch all the messages for job from the database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new message to the database.

put.description: Update one or more messages in the database.

get.description: Fetch Message using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more messages from the Database.

get.description: Fetch the job for message from the database.
